mapper.select: SELECT ALBUM_ID AS "albumId" ,TRACK_NO AS "trackNo" ,CONTRIBUTOR AS "contributor" ,COMMENT AS "comment" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM_CONTRIBUTOR WHERE ALBUM_ID = #{albumId} AND TRACK_NO = #{trackNo} AND CONTRIBUTOR = #{contributor}

SELECT ALBUM_ID AS "albumId" ,TRACK_NO AS "trackNo" ,CONTRIBUTOR AS "contributor" ,COMMENT AS "comment" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM_CONTRIBUTOR WHERE ALBUM_ID = #{albumId} AND TRACK_NO = #{trackNo} AND CONTRIBUTOR = #{contributor} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ALBUM_ID AS "albumId" ,TRACK_NO AS "trackNo" ,CONTRIBUTOR AS "contributor" ,COMMENT AS "comment" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM_CONTRIBUTOR WHERE 1 = 1 AND ALBUM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{albumId}, '%') AND TRACK_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{trackNo}, '%') AND CONTRIBUTOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contributor}, '%') AND COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comment}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createDatetime}, '%') AND UPDATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateDatetime}, '%') ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart}, ${theFetchSize}
